tool_description: WordWise Dictionary is your essential API for English language mastery, with an extensive library of over 277,000 words. It’s not just a dictionary—it’s a comprehensive guide to word meanings, usage examples, and grammatical variations. Whether you’re learning a new word, finding the perfect synonym, or teaching language nuances, WordWise Dictionary is the tool for the job. Offering intuitive search, detailed parts of speech, and filters for efficient navigation, it’s the go-to resource for s...
name: WordWise Dictionary
title: WordWise Dictionary

api_list.name: SearchEntries
api_list.description: Dive into the depth of language with **SearchEntries**, your go-to endpoint for exploring the WordWise Dictionary. Simply input a word or the beginning letters into the search parameter, and instantly receive up to **25** relevant entries. Perfect for quick lookups or broadening your vocabulary, this endpoint prioritises ease of use and relevance, ensuring you get accurate and meaningful results. Ideal for learners and enthusiasts alike, **SearchEntries** brings the world of words right to your fingertips.

api_list.name: WordsByPartsOfSpeech
api_list.description: **WordsByPartsOfSpeech** offers a targeted way to explore words by their grammatical category, such as nouns, verbs, and adjectives. Each search response not only lists up to **100** words per page but also comes with an array of valid parts of speech categories. Dive deeper with optional pagination, where you can specify a page number to access further content, seamlessly understanding total pages, current page, and total results at a glance. Ideal for streamlined searches and comprehensive language exploration, **WordsByPartsOfSpeech** is your grammatical guide to the world of words.

api_list.name: WordByID
api_list.description: Dive straight into the heart of language with **WordByID**, your quick access to detailed word information in the WordWise Dictionary. Just enter a word's unique ID and receive a focused snapshot, including definitions and usage. Perfect for fast lookups, **WordByID** makes discovering word details effortless and accurate.

api_list.name: FirstLetterFilter
api_list.description: Explore words with ease using **FirstLetterFilter**, your alphabetical gateway in the WordWise Dictionary. Enter any single letter, and instantly access a list of words starting with it, neatly organised into pages for easy navigation. Each query reveals up to **100** words per page, complete with total pages, current page, and total results. Perfect for quick searches or discovering new words, **FirstLetterFilter** simplifies your linguistic adventure. Optional page parameter lets you explore further.
